sentences.english: The only non-ceasefire group active along the border is the Shan State Army "South"'s Force 701.
sentences.chinese: 沿边境活跃的唯一非停火武装是南掸邦军701部队。

sentences.english: Sai Sheng Murng, deputy spokesman of the Shan State Army-South, supported the call for a Panglong-type conference.
sentences.chinese: 南掸邦军副发言人宰盛蒙，支持召开彬龙型协商会议。

sentences.english: A unit of the SSA North's First Brigade attacked without provocation.
sentences.chinese: 北掸邦军第一旅的单位遭缅军突然袭击。

sentences.english: There were clashes between Tachilek-based militia groups and the SSA-S near Tachilek yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 大其力当地民团体和南掸邦军昨天发生武装冲突。

sentences.english: News of his armed resistance group immediately spread throughout the state.
sentences.chinese: 他展开武装抵抗的消息立即传遍整个掸邦。

sentences.english: They can return to their SSA uniforms afterwards.
sentences.chinese: 之后他们可以再换回他们的掸邦军制服。

definition: Union of Myanmar, official name of Burma 1998-2010
Mandalay, province and second city of Myanmar (Burma)
Salween river, flowing from Tibet into Myanmar
Naypyidaw or Nay Pyi Taw, capital of Myanmar
(Tw) to defecate/to take a crap (from Taiwanese 放屎, Tai-lo pr. [pàng-sái])
Yangon (Rangoon), city, capital of Myanmar from 1948 to 2006
Wa, Kawa or Va ethnic group of Myanmar, south China and southeast Asia
